question: You have heard about plans to build new apartments in a public park near your home You want to give your opinion about this Write a letter to the editor of your local newspaper In your letter Explain how you learnt about these plans Say what you think of the park, give your opinions on the plans
text: I am writing this letter to express my concerns about the establishment of new flats in place of the park.

Recently, I came back from my official tour of the company and suddenly came to know from one of my neighbours that the local authority has decided to make a new residential building in the territory of the publicly used play area.

As you know this park is the only source of entertainment for the dwellers and it is widely used to play different sports, do social gatherings and health-related activities like jogging. Also, it is a common place for elderly people to sit, share their feelings and pass their free time. Moreover, the park resides a large chain of trees which provide fresh air and oxygen to breathe so, it is good for health perspective.

You are requested to put off the scheme of new construction of the apartments in this area. However, you may pursue it somewhere else for example at the back of the police station since that area has been left spare and not in use for many years.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
